mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NUMBER, CLUB_NUMBER, CLUB_BOARD_WRITER, CLUB_BOARD_TITLE, CLUB_BOARD_CONTENT, CLUB_BOARD_WDATE, CLUB_BOARD_VIEWS, CLUB_BOARD_TYPE, SCHEDULE_DATE, CLUB_BOARD_BLIND FROM CLUB_BOARD

SELECT BOARD_NUMBER, CLUB_NUMBER, CLUB_BOARD_WRITER, CLUB_BOARD_TITLE, CLUB_BOARD_CONTENT, CLUB_BOARD_WDATE, CLUB_BOARD_VIEWS, CLUB_BOARD_TYPE, SCHEDULE_DATE, CLUB_BOARD_BLIND FROM CLUB_BOARD WHERE BOARD_NUMBER = #{boardNumber}
